input_args.passage: 'Lenny Kravitz - Lady - YouTube | Official video of Lenny Kravitz performing Lady from the album Baptism. Buy It Here: http://smarturl.it/jiiz2q Directed by Philip Andelman. YouTube, LennyKravitzVEVO, Feb 25, 2008'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we learn that the song "Lady" by Lenny Kravitz is believed to be written about his then-girlfriend, Nicole Kidman.'
